text: Magic that grants substantial healing and resurrects units during battle.
Heals allied units for a duration.
Provides a defensive buff to surrounding units.
During a charge, the weapon of the Knight of the Sun emits a blinding light, making it difficult for enemies to see.
The Knight of the Sun and his steed transform into a spirit form, becoming ethereal.
The Knight of the Sun and his steed revert to their mortal physical forms.
